text: Today's status: started to merge the capture and recording fragment views, removed some elements/animations that won't be in this version so I have a good starting point for the new stuff. Still a lot of work to do, I'm currently running into a new problem with not being able to save the photo at all, so I'll look into that next. (Might just be a temporary problem with my phone)
Ryan doesn't need to know all of that, just that we're working on preparing the capture+record screen for the new functionality
Sounds good. Thanks for the update!
